name: natalina yoseph
text: It used to be nice place. Today me and my boyfriend went for a dinner. The pasta we ordered was so disgusting and when we try to talk to our server, he was rude and had attitude plus i don't think he understands English. The worst service ever!!!

name: Bmore Bey
text: Pizza and cheesesteak were very good. Service lacked!!! Order soup but only ate a small amount wanted to take it home. They said they didn't have any takeout bowls and  refused to give us a cup to take it home. She gave us a metal takeout …More

name: Kathryn Lockwood
text:
I visited the other day with a friend. He saw a mouse run behind me and then we had a few friendly cockroaches come right up to our table.
The service was fine but the place clearly has some sanitary issues. I won't be eating food here anymore.

name: darrell savage
text: I've dinned at Ledo's and have enjoyed the atmosphere and food for the past 15 years at various locations. Well, this Saturday, April 13, was unbelievably disappointing. Roughly between 2pm and 3pm, my family and I were met by an employee …More

name: Jonathan Randolph
text: I frequently order from this Ledo Pizza location and normally enjoy ordering their cheese pizza. However, I was very disappointed with the cheese pizza I ordered. …More

name: Katelyn Bond
text: Diner beware! A friend and I intended to have lunch at Ledo this afternoon, but walked out immediately after ordering our meal when we saw a mouse dart between booths in the dining area. Avoid.

name: Brandy Love
text: Great Selection of wine.  Food is always picture perfect and delicious.

name: Christopher B
text: Great pizza. They offer very big sized pizzas, good for groups. Not your typical round pies. The pizzas are rectangular and the pieces are cut in small squares. I love the thin crust.

name: Jeffrey Raymond
text: Food and service is fine. This location has become more of a carryout than a sitdown restaurant over the years. A decent value but not exciting.

name: Julie R
text: They have an impressive variety of toppings and although I'm not usually a thin crust fan, this was really tasty. The crust is nice and buttery and not overdone. The salads are incredibly fresh and delicious.

name: Lydia Nurse
text: Service not very good. Hot in the dining room. I prefer the location in White Marsh. NEVER asked how the meal was, asked if we needed anything or offered a refill.  Place less than half full so capacity is not an issue. Maybe service is mediocre because we are near the college. Never again!

name: Geri Peak
text: This has become our family's favorite pizza.  The deluxe with cooked bacon and pineapple is our usual order. We always pick up and we're greeted with warmth and respect.  We have eaten in, but that's not the best experience. W

name: Bev Folkoff
text: The pizza was bland and the server ignored us. I am a big Ledo fan, but was unimpressed with this location.

name: Lingle
text:
good service, girl at register was super nice
Food was pretty good too

name: Usawa Andwele
text:
The pizza is ok. Has economical wines for sale.

The owner has awesome children who work in the establishment.

name: lance6391
text:
I really like the pizza and would have given it 5 stars.
But I ordered for pickup and when I arrived the cashier told me "Sorry, we got busy and I forgot to put your order in". …More

name: Shakera Sparrow
text: I’m so disappointed. I woke up this morning to see they have tipped themselves off my card and I did NOT sign off on the amount they helped themselves to. I will never go back unless someone else is treating but I will advise them to spend their money elsewhere!

name: M
text: Yuck! I ordered light cheese and well done and what I received was tons of cheese and undercooked. Their pizza is paper thin, and gross. I called to re order and the guy I spoke to couldn’t understand what I was saying. (How on earth does …More

name: J Miller
text: I would normally not go here because the pizza (not really pizza if you have had pizza from NJ, NY or PA) is not good, but we went for a party to celebrate the end of the season for my kids sports team.  The attitude of the manager was …More

name: Niel Leon
text: Excellent thin crust pizzas as usual. Wife and Stepdaughter had plain pizza. Step Granddaughter and I had Chicken with Feta Cheese.  Pizza was ready when I arrived as promised -- Niel

name: Janee Johnson
text: Ledo's has delicious food and excellent service. This location doesn't do them any justice. I called and asked how many slices are in a 14 inch. The employee not only said she didnt know, she didnt bother to ask. Once I got.the pizza, the spices weren't all the way through. I had to use a knife to separate the pieces.

name: Manish Patel
text: Love the pizza, tastes like I remember it from childhood.  This location was decent.  The guy behind the counter was awesome and gave me a free ice tea.

name: animeviewer360
text: Decent pizza but a warning that their pizza is thin crispy crust. ~$15 for an 18" cheese. Feels more like fun food.

name: Renee Martin
text: They have great specials... Always call first because their specials are usually customized for this location only. Ummm Ummm Good!

name: Alexander
text: When I lived in Baltimore as a JHU student they had a late night special "FREE 8″ Cheese Pizza with any Calzone Purchase" which I normally order for carry out. Last time I had this they said it would be ready in 10 mins. I got there 15 mins …More

name: Subhendu Chakraborty
text: Best pizza for thin crust lovers. Just order a pizza with cheese, nothing else. You will love it.

name: K Taylor
text: My pizza was wrong.  When my kid brought it in the house I immediately called and explained everything and since I was not able to go to the restaurant I and was promised a 50% discount on the next visit, all I had to do was give them my …More

name: Will Schanno
text: Crappy customer service and cold pizza. Called in an order for pick up and the guy hung up on me before telling me how long it would take. Figuring it's a football Sunday I expected it to be a little busy so I got there about a half hour …More

name: Frank Margolis
text:
Sat 8PM Wait staff needs training. Very lackadaisical. Not fully informed of the menu. Never asked for refills, stromboli crust was burned.
We used to like this place but it is way downhill from prior visits. …More

name: Sanjay P
text: Poor hygiene. Glasses were dirty and plates were not available.

name: McKESH
text: Good food and service.

name: George Heidbreder
text: Somebody gotta tell the guy at the counter it's not pronounced like Jye-roh and they get 5 stars

name: Trinard Sh
text: I worked at this location from jan to may of 2018. I need my w2. let me know corporate!

name: AMARSHI MUKHERJEE
text: Nice place for pizza..the also have collection of beers and wines.

name: Christina Antoniades
text: I love the pizza at this Ledo's location.  The pizza tastes great.  The service is reasonable. Parking can be a little difficult sometimes.

name: michael smith
text: Excellent food! Friendly staff, low-key dining.

name: SugarPlumDrop
text: Ordered take out which they said would take 10 minutes. 40 minutes later still no pizza. The usual for this place, it's convenient if you have time to waste/don't mind not getting what you ordered. Third time I've had issues and finally took the time to rate. Would give a 1 star but still want to be kind.

name: Curtis Johnston
text: Worst service ever. The workers allow their friends to cut the line and pay for food first. Workers are super rude. Also my order was incorrect and found a hair in my food and the lady at the front desk refused to make a new pizza. When I asked for a manager she said no.

name: Justin Machado
text: The wait time for a pizza is pretty decent, around 10-15 minutes. The atmosphere is nice and of course, the cheese pizza tastes great

name: kristina a
text: Local go to because it's never really crowded.

name: Meisha Ki
text: When I called and placed the order I got great courteous customer service, but when I went to pick up the pizza the manager didn't even bother to show me the pizza and ask if it was right (as they do at every other Ledo's every other time I …More

name: Hood Chef
text: I would give them a 0 if I could. The pizza is ok but the service is horrible. I ordered online for takeout and they made my pizza wrong, which is ok but the little guy wanted to argue and say that it’s not his fault and to talk to the …More

name: Peter Woloszyn
text: Pretty good pizza.... The rest is decent.

name: Jana Hunter
text: ok food. prefer delivery to dine in.

name: Steve Panella
text: Had a lunch special of pizza and salad, both very good and a good value.

name: Felicia Burgett
text: Staff is inconsistent with how they treat customers.  Spoke with a very sweet woman last week that was very easy to work with.  Today, however, was a different story.  The men who were working today were very rude and spoke in a …More

name: Stacey Ford
text: The pizza was awesome👏✊👍 Thank y'all

name: Sebastian Corbin
text:
THE WORST customer service in 21218/Charles Village.!!!
Had to flag down the so called waiter at least 2 times just for glasses of water, as for the food, it came super fast for what I ordered, but that lasagna was …More

name: Janice Cussaac
text: Pizza was great service was great to my grands  love It

name: S. Willis
text: I like the food and service, Don't Buy the WINEthey WAY OVER CHARGE PEOPLE!

name: Ronika Bates
text: Literally one of my favorite places now. I can't stand how good the pizza it.

name: Bree H
text: Super disappointed, I normally love Ledo's but this is the worst Ledo's I have ever been to. Placed a to-go order online, arrived 5 mins after it was said to be ready and was still forced to wait 15 minutes. No one else in the restaurant …More

name: anuradha dutta
text: Ledo's made good tasty pizza. They have some deals in every Tuesdays in Calzone...that's really saves your pocket with good amount of quality food. Service is moderate. Getting parking is bit difficult in this place, especially on weekends.

name: Rose Johnson
text: They must have different owners because the food is not as good as it used to be.

name: Ry Burton
text: Best pizza on the planet, they do an amazing job and it's the best Ledo's we go to.

name: Ola
text: Decent thin crust pizza. Their plain cheese pizza with pineapple or pepperoni tastes the best. Avoid the pizzas with soggy tortilla chip topping.

name: srinivas kumar
text: They make square pizzas which is awesome. They serve a wide selection of beer too.

name: Antonio Wells
text: The 2 pasta entrees I've had, have been great! I like the brew choice as well

name: Charles Fleming
text: Ordered a South Street cheesesteak, the box was wet with grease. Opened the box to find they pretty much put hamburger helper on a sub roll. Nothing about the sub resembled a cheesesteak. Also got buffalo chicken waffle fries, the fries …More

name: Toyaire White
text: Went here for lunch break Food was great, atmosphere was nice  and customer service was great

name: Liben Chen
text: The cannon ball pizza is good; but the salad is not fresh, especially avocados.

name: G Hartman
text: Really enjoyed the pizza here. Better than Joe Squared

name: Jon
text: decent food but raised prices on their monday stromoli deal.  classic capitalism

name: James Drenning
text: Great food, pizza is amazing. Medium pizza is quite a lot for me.

name: dawnyel t
text: Great food, very nice people.

name: Golam Rasul
text: Very nice food and I love pizza

name: ivan henson
text: Food is pretty good

name: Kamau Collins
text: Kabir is the best, pizza always good, can't really complain.

name: Tasha Hickey
text: Pizza was okay not how it usually taste. Pizza was not cut all the way. These are minor errors. But I ordered a ceaser salad when I opened it there was Mexican cheese on the salad ... WHAT?

name: M Wheeler
text: Wait staff is excellent and food is delicious.

name: Dad Kevin
text: Best eats between 11pm amd midnight

name: Chae Chung
text: Ok option. Bella Roma is better

name: Karen Pringle
text: The worst  customer service every. The place also smelled terrible

name: Jennifer A. Lopez Avila
text:
I shouldn't even give it a star.
I am at home right now with food poisoning after eating this, how did I know? It's the only thing I had today, and now I can't even move out of my bed.

name: Nicholas Jewett
text: The staff is amazing and super friendly. The food is still just Ledo's.

name: Larry Alexander
text: Good food plain and simple

name: Grant Mosser
text: Great deals and even greater pizza

name: Francis Hopkins
text: The only reason why I would go to Ledo's is for the convenience. Nearly every experience I had with them, carry out or eat in, has been a mostly bad experience. I remember my first time I did carry out, they forgot half my order and I had …More

name: Mark Reid
text: Ledo is the BEST pizza in town!

name: Haili Giordano
text: Dont take my spot

name: Amber Jones
text: Whoever was working the register/phone on Monday evening 03/05/18 should not be interacting with customers. Terrible service and attitude overall. I hope I’m not greeted by him the next time I come here or it might just be the last time. …More

name: Elizabeth Gall
text: It's a Ledo's, it's got pizza, and it's not too crowded. Service can be slow, but on the plus side, you can hang for as long as you like.

name: Leon Parker
text: Excellent crisp crust on the pizza!!! Brought some home too!!!
